TopicTitle: Live Streams of the SXSW LANfest Tournament

Articles.Content:
Rheld and BloodKnight9923 are streaming both their practices and attempts at the KSP tournament challenge live from LANfest at SXSW.

For those of you down in Austin, it's going on from 7-10 PM on the 2nd floor of the Palmer Events Center. Members of Team KSP will be in attendance. For everyone who can't make it, watch the streams below. Warning - language may be NSFW

Rheld: http://bit.ly/1h2h8fc

BloodKnight9923: http://bit.ly/1oBc7gn
